msbt.message: YIKES!<10_9 /> Now don't get freaked out, butyou're being watched.Careful! It looks like it wants to attack! Tell you what, you take care of itand I'll back you up.

Creepin' crawlies! I just caught a glimpse of the enemy!<20_2 arg="6" />What enemy?! THE enemy! The right over there! That thing looks poisonous! If you get too close, you could be in a world of hurt, !
I'll call dibs! That thing is mine to catch, so hands off!Buuuuuut I guess if you REALLY want to take this one yourself, I'll let you have it.
